name: This is NOT your game (fan game)
name_original: This is NOT your game (fan game)
description:
First things first this game was made as a self-inflicted game jam! I made this whole game in 2 weeks.  This is a fan game based on the lore that streamer/youtuber Guqqie did on their smp called Area Unkown. Although you don't have to have watched the smp to get the idea of what's going on I HIGHLY recommend you do! (you can find the vods for the smp over here and you can watch the lore vod of what the game is based on over  here )

PLEASE NOTE! I DO NOT OWN THE CHARTERS OF THIS GAME BESIDES A FEW NPCS! 

This game should only take you roughly 30-45 minutes to get all 3 endings! 

CONTENT WARNING FOR GAME! There are a few things you wanna keep in mind before you play!

This game contains the following:

-Mind flashing lights

-very bright colors

-blood

-strangulation

-implied derealization

-stabbings

-raw meat png

-isolation

-interactive drowning

-and swearing

______________________________________________________________________________________________

Credits for used materials that I do not own:
Most of the music- https://rpgmaker.net/musicpack/

Ending songs- Radiohead "exit for a film" instrumental and Car Seat Headrest "Nervous Young Inhumans" instrumental 

Sound effects- https://www.zapsplat.com/

Pluggins:

- https://galvs-scripts.com/2020/08/24/mz-layer-graphics/

Story and charters belongs to Guqqie and Aimsey

Suggested game title- @LavendelLavie on twitter
